>>By the way, I bought a big bag of Skittles yesterday because Sam likes

always leaves us little surprise skittles around Conor's room. <g>

Life is good.
~Mary

messages.subject: Re: manipulation
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/10/2002 10:53:34 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Well, if I m going to be manipulated by anyone, I d rather it be all of you!  By the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/10/2002 10:53:34 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> In a message dated 9/10/02 2:15:15 AM, warblwarbl@... writes:
> <<I
> factories in New Jersey. ....
>
> << because
> after all that talk about M&Ms, even with diarrhea talk added, I wanted
> some!

>
>
Well, if I'm going to be manipulated by anyone, I'd rather it be all of you! <
g>
By the way, I bought a big bag of Skittles yesterday because Sam likes them
(and I can't even stand the smell!) and they're gone and I don't think he has
the skittles...

Pam T.
